snippet: Karim Assef and Diego De Giorgi have been appointed co-heads of Bank of America’s global investment bank.
abstract: DealBook Online; Bank of American internal memo announces naming of Karim Assef and Diego De Giorgi as co-heads of its global investment bank.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: Karim Assef and Diego De Giorgi have been appointed co-heads of Bank of America’s global investment bank.

headline.main: Bank of America Names New Investment Banking Heads
